com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.test

Class AbstractTestRunMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.test.AbstractTestRunMojo
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestDerbyRunMojo, TestH2RunMojo, TestHSQLDBRunMojo

    public abstract class AbstractTestRunMojo
extends Object
    Unit tests for the Mojo that implements the run goal.
    Author:
    Brian Matthews
